author: Ryan Daws
description:
Apple has unveiled Metal 4, an overhaul of its graphics API that brings native AI capabilities alongside improved gaming performance. The announcement, made during the company’s WWDC 2025 developer showcase, represents Apple’s latest attempt to woo both game developers and AI enthusiasts. Apple’s transition to its own silicon has been impressively smooth, but developers are... Read more »

The post Apple fuses AI with graphics in Metal 4 overhaul appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Apple fuses AI with graphics in Metal 4 overhaul
